code: import*as axiosHelper from"./api_helper";import qs from"qs";export const convertAPI=async _ref=>{let{payload}=_ref;const res=await axiosHelper.post("/convert",payload);if(res.status)return res;else throw new Error(res.message);};export const previewConversionAPI=async payload=>{const body={from:payload.fromAsset,to:payload.toAsset};const res=await axiosHelper.get("/convert/preview?".concat(qs.stringify(body)));if(res.status)return res;else throw new Error(res.message);};
